text: Yasa prakara dhokha di'era usale ti duvaila'i vistarai aphno papatira akrsta garihalyo. Jaba tiniharu duvaile tyasa rukhako phalako svada cakhe taba tiniharuka guptangaharu eka arka agadi prakata bhaihale. Ra tiniharule svargako patabata aphno sarira dhamkna thale. Tyasapachi tinako palanakartale tiniharula'i sambodhana gardai bhane ki, ke maile timiharula'i yasa vrksabata roka laga'eko thi'ena? Ra bhaneko thi'ena ki, saitana timro khullarupama satru ho
